description: Telegram bot API implementation on .NET framework
releaseNotes:
- Switching to chat (instead of IConversationSource) for filed Chat in MessageInfo class. ChatInfo type returned
- Reorganize project:
AvialableTypes to Types folder,
Interface to Interface folder,
Enum to BotEnum folder,
Result to Result folder,
Extension to Extension folder.
Made for scalability of the project. After this update, you need to re-import reference type (namespace changed)
- Changed field Id of the class ChatInfo, GroupChatInfo and IConversationSource interface (int to long)
- In the methods of class TelegramBotClient, the type of the ChatId variable is changed to object (for all methods)
- Added KeyboardButton. Many changes in ReplyKeyboardMarkup. (ArrayOfArray string replaced by ArrayOfArray KeyboardButton)

 - Fix improper assignment to the field Audio.Title in MessageInfo
 - Added new type Chat (as ChatInfo) and enum ChatType
 - Added type ChatPhoto (as ChatPhotoInfo).
 - Added ForwardFromChat field in MessageInfo.
 - Fixed error: Null Reference Exception when accessing empty fields ReplyToMessage and PinnedMessage
 - Added parser BooleanResult for method receiving bool value in result (in response)
 - Added LeaveChat method to TelegramBotClient
 - Change returned variable for SendChatAction method (void => BooleanResult)
 - Added extension ToUnixTime.
 - Added method KickChatMember to TelegramBotClient
 - Change type for unix time (int => long)
 - Added mehod UnbanChatMember in TelegramBotClient
 - Reworked the class ReplyKeyboardMarkup.
 - Unused class constructors were removed (in Type class).
 - Add type MessageEntityInfo.
summary: Do you want to create a smart automated bot on Telegram App? If you plan to write the logic using .NET framework, this tool might help you.
title: NetTelebot
